overview: In volume 7, Joey Silvera's Face Fucking Inc. series soars to crazy-sexy new heights of oral wrecktitude as ten beyond-scrumptious open-minded young porn sluts take a sordid assortment of dicks so far down their throats you'd almost expect to see them coming out the other end. Asian hottie London Keyes shows her bossy attitude, rocking a prep school uniform while asserting that during her face-fuck sessions, "You might be on your knees, but you've got them by the balls"  before taking on a trio of big dicks.  Other highlights range from a farewell suck-a-thon from just-retired Roxy Jezel to super-submissive teen Amy Starz blowing Joey's mind and cock with her high-energy penis inhalation techniques!
title: Face Fucking, Inc. 7
